botsuggestion.ok:
✅ Suggestion sent to support server.
*Any abuse of this or any other command will be penalized.*

bugreport.correcto:
**Your error has been reported correctly.**
It will be reviewed so please be patient.
 *For further assistance or help you can go to the support server or write to DM.*
bugreport.error: There was a problem sending the message, you can send me a private message as an alternative.

donate.title: Supports
donate.desc:
**Direct donations.** You can donate to our [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/czemtb) or you will have to contact us on the support server.
**Promoting the bot.** There is to be known everywhere.
**Making ...** guides, videos, writing texts, etc. on how to use the bot. StarLight needs everyone's help.
**Writing Code.** If you know programming, you may want to share code to continue implementing new things.

Hello, I'm {client_name} and I come to help. This is my list of commands you can use.

Ping: `{ping}` ms
Categories in total: `{categorias}`

masInfo.title: More information?
masInfo.desc: Use: `{prefix} <command> help` to get your individual command information and expected parameters.

invite.title: My invitation | {client_name}
invite.descripcion: This beautiful bot can help you a lot on your server, it has a lot of commands for administrators or normal users. But I assure you that you will have fun and help you in everything you need.
invite.soporte: [Login to the Server](https://discord.gg/MZN8Yf6 'StarArmy') To get help and be aware of all the information always.
invite.web: For more information about the bot as its commands go to the [Official Site](https://starbot-oficial.herokuapp.com/ 'StarBot Discord - Start')
invite.apoyo: Support bot growth by donating what you can through [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/czemtb 'CZEMTB')

release.title: News from
release.descripcion:
**__New__** 
-Multiplier: The possibility of acquiring a multiplier for the income of money was added, this is acquired in the support server for performing certain merits 
-Category Expression and Interaction: These categories will now be separated and They have new commands, in addition to appearance improvements 
-Vote command: Here is the page to vote for the bot and other lists of bots where the button is found. 
-Roleinfo command: It gives you detailed information about a role 
-deactivatexp command: For ease of use, this command was created. Although I was already in the `delete` command 
-Trade command: New command to obtain money 
-Medals command: You will be able to see all your medals. remember you can put them on with `sb! profile edit medals` 

**__Changes__** 
-Command Help: Added useful information to command help. 
-Disappearing Commands: cat, drake, gru, trash, trump, google, lyrics. Due to API problems but in the future they will return and many more! 
-Meme command: A temporary fix has been put, soon everyone will be able to send their own memes to integrate it to the command 
-Help command: The help command has been divided and improved to improve its presentation a bit 
-Achievement command: The appearance of the achievement was changed to the xbox one version 
-Mine command: It was renamed to `minesweeper` and from aliases` minesweeper` 
-Remember command: Fixed the time that it did not say how long it was until it sent the reminder 
-Slut command: The name was changed to `dirty` being more appropriate and clarifying that it is not an nsfw command 
-Rob command: It was eliminated since it is inconsistent your existence in a global economy 
-Trans command: commission increased from 10% to 15% 

**__Fixes__** 
-Optimization: An improvement was made in the code and update to improve its performance 
-Bugs: Bug fixes and appearance of various commands improved
release.footer: These are the changes of the version {version} any problem you can enter the support server. | Developed by {dev}.

vote.title: List of Bots where you can vote
vote.desc:
You can vote every 12 hours, with a double voting weekend at [Top.gg](https://discordbots.org/bot/517786947171909643/vote)

These are other lists where you will find the bot but they do not have a voting system yet.
1- [Discord Bots](https://discord.bots.gg/bots/517786947171909643) 2- [Bots On Discord](https://bots.ondiscord.xyz/bots/517786947171909643) 3- [MyBot List](https://portalmybot.com/mybotlist/bot/517786947171909643)
